attributes.action: Instruct the Civil Aviation Authority to permit Single Pilot Public Transport Operation up to age 65 subject to a valid medical
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: It is discriminatory to force professional pilots of 'single pilot public transport operations' to have to retire at 60.  Providing a professional pilot can pass a CAA/JAA Class  1 medical, that pilot should be able to continue to operate until the age of 65.

government_responses.details:
You recently signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "Instruct the Civil Aviation Authority to permit Single Pilot Public Transport Operation up to age 65 subject to a valid medical."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.pm.gov.uk/output/Page12974.asp
